scripts.dev:full: concurrently --kill-others --kill-others-on-fail "cd frontend && npm run dev" "npm run emulators:backend"
scripts.build: npm run build:functions && npm run docs:generate && npm run build:frontend
scripts.emulators:backend: npm run build:functions && firebase emulators:start --only auth,firestore,functions
scripts.docs: npm run build:functions && npm run openapi --workspace=functions && echo 'OpenAPI spec generated! View Scalar UI via frontend/public/api/openapi.json'
scripts.docs:generate: npm run openapi --workspace=functions && shx mkdir -p frontend/public/api && shx cp functions/openapi/openapi.json frontend/public/api/openapi.json
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build:functions && npm run docs && npm run build:frontend && firebase hosting:channel:deploy staging --expires 7d
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build:functions && npm run docs && npm run build:frontend && firebase deploy
scripts.test: npm run test:functions && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:functions && npm run test:coverage:frontend
